definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.chinese: 史班賽博士告訴觀察員，“這是令人興奮的消息。”

sentences.english: The president suggested that a UN observer should attend the conference.
sentences.chinese: 總統建議聯合國應派一名觀察員參加本次會議。

sentences.english: In certain circumstances the capabilities of a human observer are limited.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況中，人作爲觀察員的能力是有限的。

sentences.english: Several thousand observers from Sudan and abroad monitored the vote.
sentences.chinese: 來自蘇丹和國外的數千名觀察員監督了投票。

sentences.english: And that is what we as observers are trying to work with them to do.
sentences.chinese: 這也是我們這些觀察員試圖同他們合作以達到的目標。

sentences.english: At first the new jp attends court as an observer.
sentences.chinese: 起初，那位新上任的治安官以觀察員的身份出庭。

sentences.english: Observers can accompany the audit team but do not act as part of it.
sentences.chinese: 觀察員可以隨同審覈組，但不作爲其成員。

sentences.english: The president suggested that a team of UN observers should be sent to the Mid-east peace talk.
sentences.chinese: 總統建議應該派一隊聯合國觀察員參加中東和平談判。

sentences.english: The FO can use this term to communicate to his platoon that a friendly artillery unit has begun firing.
sentences.chinese: 前沿觀察員可用此術語通知其步兵排友軍已開始炮擊。

sentences.english: Loebner participates mainly as an observer.
sentences.chinese: 布納則主要是作爲觀察員參與其中。

sentences.english: Several aircraft have caught the eye of Western observers.
sentences.chinese: 一些飛機已經引起西方觀察員的注意。

sentences.english: It’s like an observer, and not the participant any more, yes.
sentences.chinese: 就像一個觀察員，而不再是參與者了，是的。

sentences.english: Check out these pictures that we have from storm spotters of the tornado.
sentences.chinese: 來看一下我們從颶風觀察員那裏獲得的照片。

sentences.english: But observers are not expecting the countries’ lucrative customs posts to be dismantled.
sentences.chinese: 但是觀察員並不期望各國撤除利潤豐厚的關稅壁壘。

sentences.english: To connect the voice of renowned legal experts, special observers Yue Shen mountain.
sentences.chinese: 來連線著名法律專家中國之聲特約觀察員嶽屾山。

sentences.english: Counts were always performed by the same two independent observers.
sentences.chinese: 讀秒總是由兩名固定不變的觀察員獨立地進行。

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

definition: Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Gong1 hui4 Lian2 he2 hui4
Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]
pinyin: Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
